Interface Zoomable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGraphView, GraphView

    Date: Jan 30, 2004

    matthew.horridge@cs.man.ac.uk
    www.cs.man.ac.uk/~horridgm

    • Method Detail

      • setZoomLevel

        void setZoomLevel(int zoomLevel)
        Requests that the zoom level is set to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        zoomLevel - The required zoom level as a percentage - A zoom level of 100 (percent) is a 1:1 ratio.

      • getZoomLevel

        int getZoomLevel()
        Gets the zoom level as a percentage.

      • getMaximumZoomLevel

        int getMaximumZoomLevel()
        Gets the maximum allowed zoom level.
        Returns:
        The maximum allowed zoom level as a percentage.

      • getMinimumZoomLevel

        int getMinimumZoomLevel()
        Gets the minimum allowed zoom level.
        Returns:
        The minimum allowed zoom level as a percentage.

      • pointToZoomedPoint

        Point pointToZoomedPoint(Point pt)
        Converts a Point to a 'zoomed' Point. e.g. (100, 200) zoomed 200 percent would be converted to (200, 400).
        Parameters:
        pt - The Point to be converted
        Returns:
        The converted Point

      • pointFromZoomedPoint

        Point pointFromZoomedPoint(Point pt)
        Converts a Point from a 'zoomed' Point. e.g. (100, 200) zoomed 200 percent would be converted to (50, 100).
        Parameters:
        pt - The Point to be converted
        Returns:
        The converted Point
